content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients in furnaces
- Ensure that you have the necessary resources in your inventory to supply the furnaces before attempting to use them. Check the status of each furnace to confirm they have the required ingredients. 

### Errors when checking power sources
- Make sure to check the power sources only after placing the necessary power-generating structures. Ensure that the structures are properly connected to the power grid.

### Errors related to crafting limitations
- Monitor your inventory and crafting capabilities to ensure you have the required materials for crafting solar panels and steam engines. If you cannot craft them, gather the necessary resources first.
